author.persName: Muhammad Husayn b. Sayyid Muhammad Hadi al-'Aqili al-'Alawi.

msItem.title: Makhzan al-Adwiyah wa Tadhkirat Uli al-Nuha. Vol. V.
msItem.note: The text continues directly from Vol. IV. Folio preceding text, recto, in ink: Presented by H.T. Colebrooke, Feby 7, 1824. Folio following text, similar note in pencil. On European paper, with watermarks including J Whatman and J Whatman 1794. (Entries for the whole set need to be brought into line.) Manuscript consists of the remainder of the work. The brief colophon implies that the patron for the whole manuscript was Mawlawi Sahib Nazir(?). (Bi-tawfiq-i Mawlawi Sahib Nazir?) Headings in red.

bindingDesc.p: Binding uniform with the other volumes of the work. Covers detached.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
